title: Bug 104986Backgound image uses an absolute path
description: Bug 104986Backgound image uses an absolute path URI(absolute path), File(relative path), Embedded Image(EncodedImage Data).
OB: Currently Chart uses an absolute path to indicate a backgournd image, that maycause the design unusable on other environments.Expected the background image can be definded in multiple ways like in reportdesigner.
